Lunarpine waited till the bot had rounded the corner, he was in the mood for
a fair hunt and giving Grizzltron a head start seemed sporting enough. He
transformed to his full wolf mode and raced off after the other bot. He
rounded the corner as Grizzltron set the second bomb. "Grrrrrrrrrrrr" he
snarled as he put his head down and dove full force at the bears back.


----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars AKA Proto <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 11:55 AM
Subject: Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron limped off while his Internal Repairs were healing his leg.
When he turn the corner he droped a bomb and set it to 10 seconds, then he
droped another one for 10 seconds.
